AntHalService.label: ANT HAL Service
AntHalService.description: Service designed for various ANT/ANT+ devices like heart rate monitors, fitness equipment etc.

BackupRestoreConfirmation.label: Backup/Restore Confirmation
BackupRestoreConfirmation.description: UI for the backup confirmation dialog when issuing 'adb backup' command. Remove it if you don't use adb to backup your device.

Bluetooth.label: Bluetooth Share
Bluetooth.description: After removal, Bluetooth won't turn on.

BluetoothExt.label: Bluetooth extensions
BluetoothExt.description: Service used for file sharing, handsfree equipment, Bluetooth modem and SIM adapter.

BluetoothMidiService.label: Bluetooth MIDI Service
BluetoothMidiService.description: Service used for connecting your device with musical instruments, stage lighting and other time-oriented media via Bluetooth.

CalendarProvider.label: Calendar Storage
CalendarProvider.description: Syncs your phone calendar with Google Calendar. Necessary for notifications too.

CallLogBackup.label: Call Log Backup/Restore
CallLogBackup.description: Backup and restore your call logs (history).

CaptivePortalLogin.label: Captive Portal Login
CaptivePortalLogin.description: A service used for displaying a special web page that is shown before using the Internet normally. Remove this if you don't use public Wi-Fi networks.

CellBroadcastReceiver.label: Cell Broadcasts
CellBroadcastReceiver.description: Remove this if you don't want to receive alerts for severe and extreme threats to life and property.

CMUpdater.label: CM Updater
CMUpdater.description: Remove it if you are upgrading through Recovery.

DeskClock.label: Clock
DeskClock.description: Remove it if you want to use another clock/alarm app.

Eleven.label: Music
Eleven.description: Remove it if you want to use another music player.

Email.label: Email
Email.description: Remove it if you don't use a local email server.

Gallery2.label: Gallery
Gallery2.description: Remove it if you use another photo gallery.

HTMLViewer.label: HTML Viewer
HTMLViewer.description: Lets you view HTML files on your device.

LatinIME.label: Android Keyboard (AOSP)
LatinIME.description: Stock Android keyboard. Safe to remove if replaced by another keyboard.

LiveWallpapers.label: Android Live Wallpapers
LiveWallpapers.description: Remove it if you don't use live wallpapers.

LiveWallpapersPicker.label: Live Wallpaper Picker
LiveWallpapersPicker.description: Remove it if you don't use live wallpapers.

ManagedProvisioning.label: Managed Provisioning
ManagedProvisioning.description: Customizes the profile/device owner provisioning flows with corporate colors and logos.

messaging.label: Messaging
messaging.description: Make sure you install another messaging app before removing this.

MmsService.label: Messaging Service
MmsService.description: Necessary for receiving SMS/MMS. Some messaging apps won't require this service, some will. Create a backup just in case.

PrintSpooler.label: Print Spooler
PrintSpooler.description: Interacts with the printer and orders the print jobs in your queue.

Profiles.label: Profiles Trust Provider
Profiles.description: A trust agent used so that system profiles can better lock/unlock your device when you switch profiles.

SharedStorageBackup.label: Shared Storage Backup
SharedStorageBackup.description: Performs a backup of shared-storage file systems.

Snap.label: Camera
Snap.description: There are many alternatives in Play Store.

SoundRecorder.label: Sound Recorder
SoundRecorder.description: There are many alternatives in Play Store.

WAPPushManager.label: WAP Push Manager
WAPPushManager.description: Tethering connectivity. Remove it if you don't use tethering/access point mode.

webview.label: Android System WebView
webview.description: System component powered by Chrome that allows Android apps to display web content. Remove it if you don't need in-app web content.
